metadata.title: CVE-2023-4054 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When opening appref-ms files, Firefox did not warn the user that thesefiles may contain malicious code. *This bug only affects Firefox onWindows. Other operating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 116, Firefox ESR < 102.14, Firefox ESR < 115.1,Thunderbird < 102.14, and Thunderbird < 115.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
